CustomField.formula: DATE( VALUE(TEXT(Compliance_Year__c)), /* Extract Year */ CASE( TEXT(Quarter__c), /* Extract Quarter */ "Q1", 1, /* January for Q1 */ "Q2", 4, /* April for Q2 */ "Q3", 7, /* July for Q3 */ "Q4", 10, /* October for Q4 */ 1 /* Default (January, for safety) */ ), 1 /* Day always starts on 1 */ )
CustomField.label: Quarter Start Date
